Subject: Brotherhood Goals Completed
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Smokescreen/Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:



Vehement deactivated the sonic emitters in his palm, seeing Smokescreen's 
chest reach a near destroyed point.  He sent an arm forward in a fist, 
slamming into the armor.  With his other hand he grabbed the beaten chest 
plalte and tore downward, ripping off a piece.

Throwing the piece at the shields, he sent a hand inside, barely able to fit 
and ripped around.  His optics glowed darker as his hand clasped around 
something.  He pulled out feriously, turning his back to the slumped over 
Smokescreen as he looked at the shape that was in his hand.  Opening his 
mech-fluid covered hand he saw a perfect black sphere in his hand.  It was 
about the size of a human tennis ball, which was very small compared to the 
sixteen foot high Vehement.

"Excellent." he smiled, the sphere disappearing into his subspace pocket.  
His left hand took the shape of a barrel and he raised it at the hole in the 
CF, knowing the shields were still up.

He activated a comm. link on all Maximal frequencies.  He had what he came 
for, he was eager to get on with his holy mission.  

"This is Vehement, leader of the faction called the Brotherhood.  If the 
shields are not lowered in five cycles my forces and I will take them down by 
force.  When the shields are lowered and we leave, I expect not to be fired 
upon.  If I am fired upon, we will kill whoever shot at me.  Comply in the 
time alotted."

---

Sun Crusher could hear Vehement and smiled, turning around to point the rifle 
down at the general group of people gathered around Future Zardus and Iron 
Raptor.

Reflector kept his aim on the shields, ready to open fire with everything he 
got (which wasn't much).
